item.description:
Hey Boston Mandrin-speakers! Come to the August Moon Festival in Quincy this Sunday. Organized by the Quincy Asian Resources, Inc (QARI), this event features food trucks, performances, kids rides, and tables displaying Asian community organizations in Greater Boston. The event raises money for QARI, a nonprofit that provides ESL classes, youth programs, and other resources for the Quincy Asian community.

Right off the Quincy Center stop on the Braintree Red Line!

Â 

August Moon Festival in Quincy

Quincy Asian Resources, Inc (QARI)

Asian community organizations in Greater Boston

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Quincy August Moon Festival
